      • cancel

        public boolean cancel(long join)
        Cancels the scan thread. If the scan thread is not active or join is less than 0, this method will return immediately. If join is greater than or equal to 0, the scan thread will join per the contract of Thread.join(long) using join as the argument.
        Parameters:
        join - The join in milliseconds. If less than 0 this method will not wait for the scan thread to complete.
        Returns:
        true if the scan thread is no longer running before this method returns, false otherwise.
